text:
Charlie Ross Heaton (born 6 February 1994) is a British actor and musician. He portrays Jonathan Byers in the Netflix series "Stranger Things". He will star in the upcoming superhero/horror movie "The New Mutants" (2020). He has also appeared in "Casualty".
Heaton was born in Bridlington, East Yorkshire, England. He moved to London at the age of 16. He has a son, Archie (born 2014), with his ex-girlfriend Akiko Matsuura.
